name: Karate Chop Challenge Free
description:
Ultimate Karate Chop Challenge is an fun classic arcade style casual game of speed and agility. Karate chop the blocks and avoid the deadly ones by tapping on the left or right side of the screen. It’s not as easy as it sounds. It's easy to play but hard to master. Can you become the Ultimate Karate Master?

+ Karate Chop Blocks
+ Avoid Deadly Blocks
+ Easy Tap Controls
+ Karate Simulation
+ Play For High Score
+ Fun And Addictive
+ Leaderboard
